Package com.github.xemiru.luamesh

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FunctionCType
    ctype() function, meant to be injected into a Lua environment while using LuaMesh.
    LibraryMeta
    Metadata for LuaLibrary types.
    LuaLibrary
    A Lua library implemented by Java methods.
    LuaMesh
    Primary class for LuaMesh.
    LuaMeta
    Contains metadata for a Lua-coercible Java type.
    LuaMethodBind
    Utility class responsible for calling Java methods from within Lua.
    LuaObjectValue<T>
    Generic container for Java objects to be passable as Lua objects.
    LuaUtil
    Utility class for interfacing with Lua objects.
    MeshTransformer
    Handles bytecode transformation of meshed classes annotated with LuaType.
    MeshTransformer.AnnotationHarvester
    Hand-picks specific values from an annotation declaration.
    MeshTransformer.MethodTransformer
    Transforms methods annotated with LuaType to be able to interface with a Lua environment.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LuaType.MetaEntry
    Denotes a list of targets within a Lua metatable where a Java member reference might be placed.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidCoercionTargetException
    Exception denoting that a target specified by a LuaType annotation cannot be coerced into a Lua environment.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    LuaDoc
    Helps generate Lua documentation for defined types.
    LuaType
    Defines class and class members able to be pushed into a Lua environment.
